section.title: Telemetry sample configuration files
section.para: All the files in this section can be found in the /etc/ceilometer/ directory.

section.title: ceilometer.conf
section.para: The configuration for the Telemetry services and agents is found in the ceilometer.conf file.
This file must be modified after installation.

section.title: event_definitions.yaml
section.para: The event_definitions.yaml file defines how events received from other OpenStack components should be translated to Telemetry samples.
You should not need to modify this file.

section.title: pipeline.yaml
section.para: Pipelines describe a coupling between sources of samples and the corresponding sinks for transformation and publication of these data. They are defined in the pipeline.yaml file.
You should not need to modify this file.

section.title: policy.json
section.para: The policy.json file defines additional access controls that apply to the Telemetry service.
